text: Karl Micallef (born 8 September 1996) is a Maltese footballer who plays as a centre-back for Hamrun Spartans and the Malta national team. ==Career== Micallef made his international debut for Malta on 26 March 2019, coming on as a substitute for Jonathan Caruana in the 85th minute of the UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying home match against Spain, which finished as a 0–2 loss. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- !colspan=3|Malta |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2019||1||0 |- !Total!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Maltese footballers Category:Malta youth international footballers Category:Malta under-21 international footballers Category:Malta international footballers Category:Association football central defenders Category:Pietà Hotspurs F.C. players Category:Ħamrun Spartans F.C. players Category:Maltese Premier League players
title: Karl Micallef
